categories.name: Ritual Masks
categories.description: Ceremonial visages inspired by folklore and the occult.

categories.name: Cinema Props
categories.description: Hyper-realistic artifacts designed for film and theater.

categories.name: Wearable Art
categories.description: Avant-garde pieces that blur the line between fashion and sculpture.

projects.title: The Stag King
projects.description: A weather-beaten bone mask with intricate antler carvings, used in the Autumn Equinox short film.

images.caption: Front view of the Stag King mask

projects.title: Clockwork Gauntlet
projects.description: Fully articulated brass and leather gauntlet. Non-functional gears added for aesthetic depth.

images.caption: The gauntlet on a display stand

projects.title: Void Visage
projects.description: A minimalist high-gloss black mask designed for a modern interpretation of No-Face.

projects.title: Ethereal Crown
projects.description: Wire and resin structure meant to mimic a halo of frozen light.

projects.title: Ancient Relic
projects.description: A prop stone tablet with faux moss and eroded runes.

images.caption: Top down view of the relic
